thumb.name: Bright and Bold Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3EBusiness Card Instructions:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E1. To personalize and print this project, click on the preview image to the left to open the workspace.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E2. Personalize the text and graphics. Select the text to change it or its size, color, and font. Even add digital photos!%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E3. Click on the Print button, select the number of copies you'd like to print and go!. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cb%3ETips:%3C/b%3E Print your business cards on plain paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E

thumb.name: Good Sport Award Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3CB%3EPosters%3C/B%3E get your message across when you have something Big to say. Add your wishes. thoughts. or announcements to our attention-getting graphics for one-of-a-kind decoration.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll need:%3C/B%3E Paper. 8 1/2 x 11 inches. Use plain white paper. colored paper. or card stock. depending on how colorful and durable you'd like your poster to be.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick on %3CB%3EPersonalize Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Create %26 Print workspace.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EPersonalize the text. Select the text to write over it or change size. color. and font style.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EFor additional poster pages. click %3Cb%3EAdd Page%3C/b%3E and follow the directions.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EPrint your project.%3C/LI%3E%3C/ol%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. %3Cbr%3E
